pinyin: Bu4 la1 di2 si1 la1 fa1

definition: cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.english: Cool energy drink spotted in the nether - regions of Bratislava.
sentences.chinese: 清涼飲料發現了虛空，布拉迪斯拉發地區。

sentences.english: This weekend the World Dog Show is taking place in Bratislava, Slovakia.
sentences.chinese: 本週末，世界狗展在斯洛伐克布拉迪斯拉發舉行。

sentences.english: Also police ordered all people to leave the international airport in Bratislava .
sentences.chinese: 警察還下令所有人撤離布拉迪斯拉發國際機機場。
